title: Mounting concern about EU and neighbouring countries (RSF - Reporters sans frontières)
text: ( Source : RSF - Reporters sans frontières ) The countries of the European Union and Balkans have usually been ranked fairly high in the Reporters Without Borders press freedom index but there has been an alarming decline in recent months. The
